block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$518,000 345 East 56th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,400-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, windowed dining area, renovated kitchen, parquet floors, c/a; maintenance $1,400, 63% tax-deductible; listed at $525,000, 18 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$518,000 345 East 56th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,400-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, windowed dining area, renovated kitchen, parquet floors, c/a; maintenance $1,400, 63% tax-deductible; listed at $525,000, 18 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

$632,500 116 Pinehurst Avenue (Hudson View Gardens) 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 2,300-sq.-ft. combination of two co-op units in a prewar building; dining room, den, h/w floors, Fort Tryon Park view; maintenance $1,740, 24% tax-deductible; listed at $650,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Simone Song Properties)

$812,500 176 East 71st Street (Townsend House) 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, entry foyer, windowed kitchen, dining area; maintenance $1,513, 47% tax-deductible; listed at $849,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Halstead Property Co.)

$475,000 171 East 84th Street (Evans Towers) 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,016-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, windowed kitchen, h/w floors, balcony, health club and pool in building; common charge $649; taxes $6,000; listed at $485,000, 6 weeks on market (Brokers: Halstead Property Co.; William B. May)

$689,000 55 West 83rd Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 900-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a prewar building; elevator, exposed-brick walls, renovated kitchen, h/w floors, terrace; maintenance $802, 75% tax-deductible; listed at $689,000, 17 weeks on market (Broker: Bellmarc)

$303,000 750 Kappock Street (Glen Briar) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, h/w floors, terrace, 2 exposures, indoor parking space, partial Hudson River view; maintenance $864, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $295,000 (multiple bids), 2 weeks on market (Broker: John Edwards Real Estate)

$463,500 515 East 23rd Street 6-bedroom, 4-bath, 80-year-old center-hall brick colonial; dining room, sun porch, rear deck, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,106; listed at $479,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Wilk)

$450,000 478 Argyle Road 5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 82-year-old brick and stucco-sided Tudor; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, finished basement, rear porch, 45-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,856; listed at $490,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Mary Kay Gallagher)

$650,000 423 Ninth Street 2-family, 3-story prewar row house; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, parquet floors, original moldings and detail in both lower duplex and upper simplex; needs renovation; 19-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,000; listed at $675,000, 10 weeks on market (Broker: Orrichio & Anderson)

$315,000 69-11 Loubet Street 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 50-year-old detached brick house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, new windows, semifinished basement, terrace, 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,590; listed at $359,000, 9 weeks on market (Broker: Dix)

$130,000 6 Burns Street (Tennis View) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 670-sq.-ft. furnished co-op in a prewar building; dining area, marble floors, renovated kitchen and bath; maintenance $410, including electricity, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $135,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Don Goldman)

$187,000 166 Ardmore Avenue 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 30-year-old semiattached colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, sunken living room, finished basement, rear deck, 30-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,510; listed at $169,000 (multiple bids), 3 weeks on market (Broker: Salmon)

$305,000 7 Atlas Place 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 69-year-old Tudor; entry hall, fireplace, dining room, family room, eat-in kitchen, skylight, 1-car garage, 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $5,350; listed at $319,000, 11 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Ragette; Jonor Agency)

$250,000 30 West Elizabeth Street 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 104-year-old colonial; entry hall, dining room, fireplace, eat-in kitchen, storage room; 33-by-66-ft. lot; taxes $4,000; listed at $245,000 (multiple bids), 21 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker; Houlihan/Lawrence)

$1.825 million 41 Schoolhouse Road 4-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 13-year-old colonial farmhouse; library with oak cabinetry, 4 fireplaces, barn, paddocks, pond, pool, 9.8-acre lot; taxes $24,506; listed at $1.8 million (multiple bids), 3 weeks on market (Brokers: Renwick & Winterling; Houlihan/Lawrence)

$202,500 34 Dana Road 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 39-year-old split-level; fireplace, h/w floors, new windows and roof, 2-car garage, 0.97-acre lot; taxes $2,643; listed at $209,900, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

$402,500 8 Historic Drive 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 16-year-old colonial; eat-in kitchen, family room with cathedral ceilings, home office, 2 fireplaces, porch, deck, 2-car garage, 1-acre lot on cul-de-sac; taxes $6,063; listed at $402,500, 56 weeks on market (Brokers: William Pitt; William Raveis)

$356,500 11 Grumman Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 100-year-old colonial farmhouse; dining room, renovated kitchen and baths, c/a, 0.2-acre lot; taxes $3,249; listed at $395,000, 16 weeks on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker/Norwalk)

$1.395 million 10 Meadowbank Road 4-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 76-year-old Dutch colonial; dining room with bay window, family room, fireplace, 4-car detached garage, private access to Long Island Sound, 0.4-acre lot; taxes $5,351; listed at $1.295 million (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker/Old Greenwich)
$169,500 38 Curve Lane 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 52-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, eat-in kitchen, 60-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,700; listed at $179,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Manor Gate)

$425,000 44 Gale Drive 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 34-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den with fireplace, basement, 60-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $10,500; listed at $489,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Jan Kalman)

$730,000 56 Longview Road 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 62-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, family room, fireplace, 1-car attached garage, 70-by-173-ft. lot; taxes $9,900; listed at $719,000 (multiple bids), 3 weeks on market (Brokers: Accents; Goodstein Harbor Town)

$450,000 8 Carpenter Place 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 40-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, fireplace, finished basement, 2-car attached garage, 150-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $6,000; listed at $525,000, 10 weeks on market (Brokers: Daniel Gale; Harmonious Homes)

$440,000 8 Grove School Road 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 10-year-old colonial; family room, full basement, deck, in-ground pool, 2-car garage, 2.2-acre lot; taxes $7,785; listed at $459,900, 11 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)

$307,000 78 Minnehaha Boulevard 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 43-year-old Cape Cod; eat-in kitchen, living room with fireplace, finished basement, 1-car garage, 127-by-56-ft. lot; taxes $5,499; listed at $319,900, 11 weeks days on market (Broker: Atlantic Real Estate/Better Homes and Gardens)

$133,000 744 Hanson Avenue 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 57-year-old Cape Cod; eat-in kitchen, c/a, enclosed sun porch, 1-car garage, 50-by-103-ft.lot; taxes $3,242; listed at $136,500, 10 days on market (Broker: Weichert)
